weekOf: February 5th to February 12th (Not live until ~5am EDT on February 5th)
introMessages: Use twin Shotaro beam trails to destroy rival couples in Deadline Duet, a new Adversary Mode added to GTA Online right in time for Valentine’s Day and paying out Triple Rewards for the next two weeks.
Winning two matches of Deadline Duet will satisfy the Weekly Challenge and reward you with GTA$100,000.
The next two weeks will also feature plenty of activities for groups: earn 4X Salaries working as an Associate or Bodyguard through February 18 and get free Champagne in all Nightclubs.
Come back next week to celebrate the Year of the Fire Horse in GTA Online with a new Lunar New Year Stunt Race, Yuanbao Collectibles, and more.
prizeRideChallenge: Win in the LS Car Meet Series Once
weeklyChallenge: Win two Adversary Modes to receive GTA$100,000
bonuses: 2X GTA$, RP, and Research Progress - Bunker Research Missions
2X GTA$ and RP - Community Race Series
discounts: 40% Off: Meth Lab Properties and Upgrades
